EmailTemplate.subject: Build Buyer Confidence, Trust In Your New Vehicles
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
You can now bring the power of Kelley Blue Book® valuations to your new car listings, helping you build buyer confidence and trust in your vehicles, asking prices and dealership.
vAuto’s latest product, the Kelley Blue Book Price Advisor Report for new vehicles, helps your inventory stand out with today’s buyers. Each report delivers:
Instant credibility and trust with buyers: In a single click from a new vehicle VDP, buyers get all the answers they need about a vehicle, your asking price and your dealership. Each KBB Price Advisor Report for new vehicles integrates car-specific descriptions and expert reviews, pricing validation from KBB, and dealership reviews from DealerRater, Google and other third-parties.
Sales team consistency: KBB Price Advisor Report for new vehicles arms sales associates to share the same information buyers see online, every time. In addition, the application provides reporting tools to “inspect what you expect” from sales associates.
More profitable sales, satisfaction: Dealers who use KBB Price Advisor Report for new vehicles deliver a more customer-satisfying, transparent and trust-based car-buying experience. The end result: Better close ratios, fewer discounts and more sold units.
I’d invite you to discover how to bring the power and trust of KBB Price Advisor Report for new vehicles to your dealership. To learn more, click here <http://go.vauto.com/kbb-price-advisor-report.html?Source=email&Campaign=KBB%20PAR%20New%20Car%20Email>.
If you have any questions, please contact your Performance Manager or me.
As always, thank you for your ongoing business and support of vAuto.
Randall B. Kobat Vice President & General Manager vAuto | Live Market View 1901 S. Meyers Road, Suite 700, Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181 www.vauto.com <http://www.vauto.com>
